intro: Woonyoungia thailandica, commonly known as the Thai woonyoungia, is a flowering plant native to Thailand. It belongs to the family Fabaceae, which includes legumes and related plants. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that typically bloom in shades of pink and white. Its leaves are trifoliate, consisting of three leaflets, and it thrives in well-drained soils. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endangered species in its native habitat.
